title: Screen Writing Craft
description: A reading and craft class designed to encourage writing of original screenplays and adaptations. There will be analysis and discussion of representative examples of screen writing. Readings and lectures will accompany writing exercises. Restricted to major codes LT34 and LT42 and minor codes LT34 and LT39 during first pass of registration. All other students may register during second pass of registration with the approval of the department.
